newsitem.title: USA: Great Lakes Aviation Jan load factor slips.
newsitem.headline: Great Lakes Aviation Jan load factor slips.

text.p: Great Lakes Aviation Ltd said Tuesday its passenger load factor in January fell 0.4 points to 39.1 percent from 39.5 percent one year ago.
The carrier said available seat miles increased 1.5 points to 50.1 million from 49.3 million, while revenue passenger miles edged 0.4 points higher to 19.6 million from 19.5 million.
Great Lakes Aviation operates three regional airlines under the names United Express, Midway Airlines and Great Lakes Airlines.
Its shares closed down 1/4 Tuesday at 2-1/4.
